item.title: Tariff volatility is making it hard for investors to figure out where the S&P 500 should trade right now
item.description: It was another weekend of head-spinning news, but we are no closer to figuring out what the right level should be for stocks.

item.title: Stay away from this automaker as tariff uncertainty continues, UBS says in downgrade
item.description: Analyst Patrick Hummel downgraded shares to neutral from buy.

item.title: Apple gets an upgrade from KeyBanc after Trump announces tech tariff exemption
item.description: Trump's new guidance removes meaningful risks the iPhone maker was facing when investors were bracing for an escalating global trade war, according to...

item.title: Top Wall Street analysts find these 3 stocks attractive in these challenging times
item.description: TipRanks' analyst ranking service highlights three stocks favored by the Street's top pros, including Affirm Holdings and TJX Companies.

item.title: Five Chinese AI plays that could ride out trade war volatility
item.description: While U.S.-China trade tensions rock markets, analysts predict a handful of Chinese companies could win out on Beijing's efforts to double down on AI.
